title: Create Pod with ServiceAccount
description: Create a Pod named ||sa-pod|| using image ||nginx:1.20-alpine|| that uses the ||app-sa|| ServiceAccount in the ||venus|| namespace.

steps: kubectl run sa-pod --image=nginx:1.20-alpine --dry-run=client -o yaml > sa-pod.yaml -n venus
kubectl get pod sa-pod -n venus -o yaml | grep serviceAccount

validations.command: kubectl get pod sa-pod -n venus -o jsonpath='{.spec.serviceAccountName}'
